Texts.Chs: 如我承诺，这是那把骨制十字弩的蓝图。战得精彩，上尉。
Texts.Eng: As promised, here is the schematic for that Bone Crossbow. Fight well, Captain.

Texts.Chs: 我看见你拿着一把骨弓，上尉。现在在这个避难所里使用传统武器的人太少了... 我有一张^orange;骨制十字弩的蓝图^white;可以与您共享，前提是你能证明自己是个有能力的猎人。^green;回来的时候带来一根^orange;良质怪物之骨^green;，之后这张蓝图就是您的了。
Texts.Eng: I see you carry a bone bow, Captain. Far too few people in this refuge use traditional weapons nowadays... I have a ^orange;Bone Crossbow schematic ^white;you can have, if you prove yourself a capable hunter. ^green;Return to me with a ^orange;Great Monster Bone^green;, and the schematic is yours.

Texts.Chs: 回到位于^orange;远星庇护所^reset;的^orange;马克汉^reset;处
